thread.title: Equities, dollar slip as Fed rate path jitters build

title: Equities, dollar slip as Fed rate path jitters build
text:
Equities, dollar slip as Fed rate path jitters build 7:37pm IST - 01:49 
World shares were flat on Wednesday and the dollar eased off three-week highs as investors marked time before a likely hike in U.S. interest rates and awaited guidance on how many more to expect for this year. As Ciara Lee reports, markets are also on edge because of a selloff in U.S. tech shares.
